content: Phase 1: Research existing wallet components and create comprehensive wallet architecture
Phase 2: Create unified multi-chain wallet dashboard using existing MultiChainWalletView.tsx
Phase 3: Integrate existing vault banking system into main dashboard navigation
Phase 4: Expand master wallet service integration with real-time backend connectivity
Phase 5: Enhance existing wallet manager with additional DeFi protocols and yield farming
Phase 6: Create comprehensive wallet analytics dashboard using existing performance tracking
Phase 7: Implement cross-chain transaction orchestration using existing services
Phase 8: Expand wallet security features with advanced monitoring and alerts
Phase 9: Integrate all wallet components into main dashboard with dedicated Wallet tab
Phase 10: Add expanded wallet features to Advanced Dashboard Tab component library
